BuyerAccount.name: BuyerAccount
BuyerAccount.description: Represents an account that is enabled as a buyer for Lightning B2B Commerce.

AvailableCredit.description: The amount of credit available to a buyer account.

BuyerId.description: The ID of the buyer account.

CommerceType.description: The type of commerce that the buyer account is conducting, using the Commerce app.

CreditLimit.description: The limit of credit available to the buyer account.

CreditStatus.description: The type or status of the buyer account's credit ranking.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Three-letter ISO currency code associated with the buyer account record.

CurrentBalance.description: The balance carried by the buyer account.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the buyer account is active (true) or not (false).

MaximumOrderLimit.description: The maximum number of orders that can be placed by the buyer account.

MinimumOrderLimit.description: The minimum number of orders that can be placed by the buyer account.

Name.description: The name of the buyer account.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the buyer account owner.

PayerId.description: The ID of the buyer account payer.

SendToId.description: The ID of account that an order is sent to.
